00001 <?php
00002 /**
00003  * Osimo's BBCode parser.
00004  *
00005  * @author Ryan LeFevre
00006  */
00007 class OsimoBBParser {
00008  private $simple_bbcodes;
00009  private $fancy_bbcodes;
00010  private $allowedCSS;
00011 
00012  /**
00013   * Class constructor.
00014   * Registers itself with the debugging module and
00015   * loads all of the BBCode defaults.
00016   */
00017  function OsimoBBParser() {
00018   get('debug')->register('OsimoBBParser', array(
00019     'events'=>false,
00020     'benchmarking'=>false
00021    ));
00022 
00023   get('debug')->timerStart('OsimoBBParser', 'BBLoadDefaults');
00024   $this->loadDefaults();
00025   get('debug')->timerEnd('OsimoBBParser', 'BBLoadDefaults', 'Default BBCodes loaded in ');
00026  }
00027 
00028  private function loadDefaults() {
00029   $simple_defaults = array(
00030    "b"=>array(
00031     "search"=>"/\[b\](.+?)\[\/b\]/is",
00032     "replace"=>'<strong>$1</strong>'
00033    ),
00034    "i"=>array(
00035     "search"=>"/\[i\](.+?)\[\/i\]/is",
00036     "replace"=>'<i>$1</i>'
00037    ),
00038    "u"=>array(
00039     "search"=>"/\[u\](.+?)\[\/u\]/is",
00040     "replace"=>'<u>$1</u>'
00041    ),
00042    "s"=>array(
00043     'search'=>"/\[s\](.+?)\[\/s\]/is",
00044     'replace'=>'<span style="text-decoration:line-through">$1</span>'
00045    ),
00046    "url"=>array(
00047     "search"=>"/\[url\](.+?)\[\/url\]/is",
00048     "replace"=>'<a href="$1">$1</a>'
00049    ),
00050    "img"=>array(
00051     "search"=>"/\[img\](.+?)\[\/img\]/is",
00052     "replace"=>'<img src="$1" />'
00053    ),
00054    "quote"=>array(
00055     "search"=>"/\[quote\](.+?)\[\/quote\]/is",
00056     "replace"=>'<blockquote><span class="blockquote-title">Quote:</span><br/>$1</blockquote>'
00057    ),
00058    'code'=>array(
00059     'search'=>"/\[code\](.+?)\[\/code\]/is",
00060     'replace'=>'<pre class="code"><code class="plain">$1</code></pre>'
00061    ),
00062    'right'=>array(
00063     'search'=>"/\[right\](.+?)\[\/right\]/is",
00064     'replace'=>'<div style="text-align:right">$1</div>'
00065    ),
00066    'center'=>array(
00067     'search'=>"/\[center\](.+?)\[\/center\]/is",
00068     'replace'=>'<div style="text-align:center">$1</div>'
00069    ),
00070    'left'=>array(
00071     'search'=>"/\[left\](.+?)\[\/left\]/is",
00072     'replace'=>'<div style="text-align:left">$1</div>'
00073    ),
00074    'list'=>array(
00075     'search'=>"/\[list\](.+?)\[\/list\]/is",
00076     'replace'=>'<ul>$1</ul>'
00077    ),
00078    '[*]'=>array(
00079     'search'=>"/\[\*\]([^\n|\r]+)/is",
00080     'replace'=>'<li>$1</li>'
00081    ),
00082    'table'=>array(
00083     'search'=>"/\[table\](.+?)\[\/table\]/is",
00084     'replace'=>'<table>$1</table>'
00085    ),
00086    'row'=>array(
00087     'search'=>"/\[row\](.+?)\[\/row\]/is",
00088     'replace'=>'<tr>$1</tr>'
00089    ),
00090    'cell'=>array(
00091     'search'=>"/\[cell\](.+?)\[\/cell\]/is",
00092     'replace'=>'<td>$1</td>'
00093    )
00094   );
00095 
00096   $fancy_defaults = array(
00097    'email'=>array(
00098     'search'=>"/\[email=([^\]]+)\](.+?)\[\/email\]/is",
00099     'replace'=>'<a href="$1">$2</a>'
00100    ),
00101    "url"=>array(
00102     "search"=>"/\[url=([^\]]+)\](.+?)\[\/url\]/is",
00103     "replace"=>'<a href="$1">$2</a>'
00104    ),
00105    'size'=>array(
00106     'search'=>"/\[size=([0-9]+)\](.+?)\[\/size\]/is",
00107     'replace'=>'<span style="font-size:$1px">$2</span>'
00108    ),
00109    'font'=>array(
00110     'search'=>"/\[font=([^\]]+)\](.+?)\[\/font\]/is",
00111     'replace'=>'<span style="font-family:$1">$2</span>'
00112    ),
00113    'color'=>array(
00114     'search'=>"/\[color=([^\]]+)\](.+?)\[\/color\]/is",
00115     'replace'=>'<span style="color:$1">$2</span>'
00116    ),
00117    'quote'=>array(
00118     'search'=>"/\[quote=([^\]]+)\](.+?)\[\/quote\]/is",
00119     'replace'=>'<blockquote><span class="blockquote-title">Quote by $1:</span><br/>$2</blockquote>'
00120    ),
00121    'align'=>array(
00122     'search'=>"/\[align=(left|right|center)\](.+?)\[\/align\]/is",
00123     'replace'=>'<div style="text-align: $1">$2</div>'
00124    )
00125   );
00126 
00127   $this->addSimple($simple_defaults);
00128   $this->addFancy($fancy_defaults);
00129 
00130   /* Allowed CSS attributes for tables - prevents things like
00131    * using position: absolute to cover the page contents. */
00132   $this->allowedCSS = array(
00133    'width',
00134    'height',
00135    'background-color',
00136    'color',
00137    'border',
00138    'border-color',
00139    'border-style',
00140    'border-width',
00141    'border-collapse',
00142    'padding',
00143    'vertical-align',
00144    /* these next 2 aren't CSS but are useful for tables */
00145    'cellpadding',
00146    'cellspacing',
00147    'align' // not a real CSS property - will allow for easy alignment
00148   );
00149  }
00150 
00151  /**
00152   * Adds an additional BBCode parsing rule to the parser.
00153   * A "simple" BBCode is one that cannot take arguments within
00154   * the opening tag.
00155   *
00156   * @param mixed $tag
00157   */
00158  public function addSimple($tag) {
00159   if (is_array($tag)) {
00160    foreach ($tag as $name=>$code) {
00161     get('debug')->logMsg('OsimoBBParser', 'events', "Adding simple BBCode $name.");
00162     if (isset($this->simple_bbcodes[$name])) {
00163      get('debug')->logError('OsimoBBParser', 'events', "Simple BBCode name $name already exists.");
00164     }
00165     else {
00166      $this->simple_bbcodes[$name] = $code;
00167     }
00168    }
00169   }
00170   else { //make an assumption...
00171    get('debug')->logMsg('OsimoBBParser', 'events', "Adding simple BBCode $tag.");
00172    if (isset($this->simple_bbcodes[$tag])) {
00173     get('debug')->logError('OsimoBBParser', 'events', "Simple BBCode name $tag already exists.");
00174    }
00175    else {
00176     $this->simple_bbcodes[$tag] = array(
00177      "tag"=>$tag,
00178      "search"=>"/\[$tag\](.+)\[\/$tag\]/i",
00179      "replace"=>'<'.$tag.'>$1</'.$tag.'>'
00180     );
00181    }
00182   }
00183  }
00184 
00185  /**
00186   * Adds an additional BBCode parsing rule to the parser.
00187   * A "fancy" BBCode is one that can take arguments within
00188   * the opening tag.
00189   *
00190   * @param mixed $tag
00191   */
00192  public function addFancy($tag) {
00193   if (is_array($tag)) {
00194    foreach ($tag as $name=>$code) {
00195     get('debug')->logMsg('OsimoBBParser', 'events', "Adding fancy BBCode $name.");
00196     if (isset($this->fancy_bbcodes[$name])) {
00197      get('debug')->logError('OsimoBBParser', 'events', "Fancy BBCode name $name already exists.");
00198     }
00199     else {
00200      $this->fancy_bbcodes[$name] = $code;
00201     }
00202    }
00203   }
00204   else {
00205    get('debug')->logError('OsimoBBParser', 'events', 'Fancy BBCode must be passed in as an array');
00206    return false;
00207   }
00208  }
00209 
00210  /**
00211   * Used for actually parsing content with BBCode in it
00212   * based on the BBCode rules set up ahead of time (usually
00213   * automatically by the constructor).
00214   *
00215   * @param String $content
00216   *  The content to be parsed.
00217   * @param int $count   (optional, reference)
00218   *  The number of tags parsed (currently buggy and not accurate)
00219   * @return The parsed String with all BBCode converted to HTML.
00220   */
00221  public function parse($content, &$count=false) {
00222   get('debug')->timerStart('OsimoBBParser', 'ParseString');
00223   $before = strlen($content);
00224 
00225   $search = array();
00226   $replace = array();
00227 
00228   foreach ($this->simple_bbcodes as $code) {
00229    $search[] = $code['search'];
00230    $replace[] = $code['replace'];
00231   }
00232 
00233   foreach ($this->fancy_bbcodes as $code) {
00234    $search[] = $code['search'];
00235    $replace[] = $code['replace'];
00236   }
00237 
00238   if (get_magic_quotes_gpc()) {
00239    $content = stripslashes($content);
00240   }
00241 
00242   /* nocode tag check - must do this first! */
00243   $content =  preg_replace_callback(
00244    '/\[nocode\](.+?)\[\/nocode\]/is',
00245    create_function(
00246     '$matches',
00247     'return str_replace(array("[","]"),array("&#91;","&#93;"),$matches[1]);'
00248    ),
00249    $content
00250   );
00251 
00252   /* unfortunately we have to do fancy tables separately */
00253   $content = preg_replace_callback(
00254    "/\[(table)=([^\]]+)\](.+?)\[\/table\]/is",
00255    array($this, 'parseTable'),
00256    $content
00257   );
00258   $content = preg_replace_callback(
00259    "/\[(row)=([^\]]+)\](.+?)\[\/row\]/is",
00260    array($this, 'parseTable'),
00261    $content
00262   );
00263   $content = preg_replace_callback(
00264    "/\[(cell)=([^\]]+)\](.+?)\[\/cell\]/is",
00265    array($this, 'parseTable'),
00266    $content
00267   );
00268 
00269   foreach ($search as $pattern) {
00270    while (preg_match($pattern, $content)) {
00271     $content = preg_replace($search, $replace, $content, -1, $count);
00272    }
00273   }
00274 
00275   /* Handle smilies, will probably change later */
00276   //$content = $this->processSmilies($content);
00277 
00278   $after = strlen($content);
00279   get('debug')->timerEnd('OsimoBBParser', 'ParseString', "String of length $before successfully parsed, now $after characters, in ");
00280 
00281   return $content;
00282  }
00283 
00284  private function parseTable($matches) {
00285   $return_css = '';
00286   $return_attr = '';
00287   $css = explode(';', $matches[2]);
00288   if (count($css)>0) {
00289    foreach ($css as $prop) {
00290     $data = explode(':', $prop);
00291     $css_name = strtolower($data[0]);
00292     if (in_array($css_name, $this->allowedCSS)) {
00293      if ($matches[1]=='table') {
00294       if ($css_name == 'cellpadding'||$css_name == 'cellspacing') {
00295        $return_attr .= $css_name.'="'.$data[1].'" ';
00296        continue;
00297       }
00298 
00299       if ($css_name == 'align') {
00300        if ($data[1] == 'left') {
00301         $return_css .= 'margin-right: auto;';
00302        }
00303        elseif ($data[1] == 'center') {
00304         $return_css .= 'margin-right: auto;margin-left: auto;';
00305        }
00306        elseif ($data[1] == 'right') {
00307         $return_css  .= 'margin-left: auto;';
00308        }
00309        continue;
00310       }
00311      }
00312 
00313      $return_css .= $prop;
00314      if (substr($prop, strlen($prop)-1) != ';') {
00315       $return_css .= ';';
00316      }
00317     }
00318    }
00319   }
00320   if ($matches[1]=='row') { $ele_name = 'tr'; }
00321   elseif ($matches[1]=='cell') { $ele_name = 'td'; }
00322   else { $ele_name = 'table'; }
00323   return "<$ele_name $return_attr style=\"$return_css\">{$matches[3]}</$ele_name>";
00324  }
00325

00327  /*
00328   * This was copied directly from the old BBCode parser...
00329   * this will probably be completely changed in the future
00330   */
00331  private function processSmilies($post) {
00332   if (!isset($_SESSION['osimo']['options']['smileySet'])) {
00333    $query = "SELECT value FROM config WHERE name='current-smilies' LIMIT 1";
00334    $result = mysql_query($query);
00335    if ($result) {
00336     $_SESSION['osimo']['options']['smileySet'] = reset(mysql_fetch_row($result));
00337    }
00338   }
00339 
00340   /* If smiley BBCode isn't cached, then do so */
00341   if (!is_array($_SESSION['osimo']['smilies'])) {
00342    $query = "SELECT code,image FROM smilies WHERE smileySet='".$_SESSION['osimo']['options']['smileySet']."'";
00343    $result = mysql_query($query);
00344 
00345    if ($result) {
00346     $i=0;
00347     while (list($code, $image)=mysql_fetch_row($result)) {
00348      $_SESSION['osimo']['smilies']['name'][$i] = $image;
00349      $_SESSION['osimo']['smilies']['code'][$i] = $code;
00350      $i++;
00351     }
00352    }
00353   }
00354 
00355   if (is_array($_SESSION['osimo']['smilies'])) {
00356    $j=0;
00357    foreach ($_SESSION['osimo']['smilies']['name'] as $smiley) {
00358     $replace[$j] = "<img src=\"".OSIMOPATH."os-content/smilies/".$_SESSION['osimo']['options']['smileySet']."/$smiley\" />";
00359     $j++;
00360    }
00361 
00362    $post = str_replace($_SESSION['osimo']['smilies']['code'], $replace, $post);
00363   }
00364 
00365   return $post;
00366  }
